name: BubbleBoy
description:
Bubble Boy is an arcade action game with an 8-bit aesthetic that harkens back to the NES era. It borrows design elements from classics such as Bubble Bobble and Lunar Lander to create an exciting experience reminiscent of yesterday!

Take control of Bubble Boy on his mission to help the Bubble People get their Bubble Babies back to safety! 
Be careful as you fly through the dangerous caverns of planet Malakia. To help you on your quest, Bubble Boy has a fuel powered rocket booster which is used to fly around, and a bubble gun with which to trap and dispatch of foes. Take care though, as the caverns are filled with dangers and the vitally important fuel can sometimes be sparse. And keep in mind, some of the foes are completely immune to the bubbles.
Besides the caverns themselves, Bubble boy will face challenges in the form of Lord Malak’s henchmen who will do everything in their might to stop our hero.
